about_the_game:
Bounce is a 2D platformer in which you need to control a red ball. Dodge sharp spikes, use special abilities to collect all the rings scattered on the map and then you will open the way to the next interesting levels.



Control a red, nimble and cheerful ball, you have to go a long and difficult, but interesting way.

A lot of obstacles are insidiously hiding at every step, enemies want to prevent you from reaching the end and staying safe and sound.

Sharp spikes are ready at any moment to dig into the red ball and burst all hopes of victory.

Use all the opportunities to achieve the goal:


  • jump as high as possible
  • become very small and incredibly big
  • use super strength
  • become very light and take off
  • dive deep under the water

Immerse yourself in the world of tabletop and classics with Bounce!
